introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: Swipe cards off of this stack to view the next prayer in the Rosary.  If you are not mobile, you can use the keyboard's LEFT or RIGHT buttons to progress as well. Use the menu above for configuration and details.

creed.title: Apostles' Creed
creed.text:
I believe in God,
the Father almighty,
Creator of heaven and earth,
and in Jesus Christ, his only Son, our Lord,
who was conceived by the Holy Spirit,
born of the Virgin Mary,
suffered under Pontius Pilate,was crucified, died and was buried;
he descended into hell;
on the third day he rose again from the dead;he ascended into heaven,
and is seated at the right hand of God the Father almighty;
from there he will come to judge the living and the dead.

I believe in the Holy Spirit,
the holy catholic Church,
the communion of saints,
the forgiveness of sins,
the resurrection of the body,
and life everlasting.

Amen.

ourfather.title: Our Father
ourfather.text: Our Father, Who art in Heaven, hallowed be Thy name; Thy Kingdom come, Thy will be done on earth as it is in Heaven. Give us this day our daily bread; and forgive us our trespasses as we forgive those who trespass against us; and lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil. Amen.

hailmary.title: Hail Mary
hailmary.text: Hail, Mary, full of grace,the Lord is with thee. Blessed art thou amongst women and blessed is the fruit of thy womb, Jesus.Holy Mary, Mother of God, pray for us sinners, now and at the hour of our death. Amen.

glory.title: Glory
glory.text: Glory be to the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit;as it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be,world without end. Amen.

fatima.title: Fatima
fatima.text: O my Jesus, forgive us our sins, save us from the fires of hell. Lead all souls to Heaven, especially those in most need of thy mercy
